EmailTemplate.name: Teachers Vs Parents Football Challenge Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Teachers Vs Parents Football Challenge Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Parents, The Teachers Vs Parents Football Challenge is upon us!!! Date: Â Saturday 29th October, 2011Venue: ISM School (Upper Campus)Time: 11.00am meeting, with games to commence at 11.30am. All participants and fans or spectators are welcome!!! BBQ and drinks will be available...... So bring the family along to watch some "Kick and Giggle" and support for favourite teacher or Dad!!! Best Regards Mr Tim Walsh and Mr Dino Vikas.
